featured.text: V2V works by using wireless signals to send information back and forth between cars about their location, speed and direction, so that they keep safe distances from each other.

definition.zh_def: 無線的，指不需要電纜或導線的通信或連接方式。
definition.en_def: Relating to or using radio, microwaves, or other signals to transmit data without physical connections.
definition.example: The wireless internet connection allows us to access the web from anywhere in the house.
